project-challenges: Working with videos and audio tracks on iOS. It's full of bugs.
project-future-plans: Polish it and publish it in the App Store :)
project-purpose: Takes a second long video everyday for a year. And combines the video anytime to watch it and share it with friends and family.
project-inspiration: The idea is coming from The Chef movie. When you want to remember your trip, your events through out the year.
project-accomplishments: We got the the video merging feature working.
project-subtitle: Shoot one second video every day

team.participant-desc: I am a young and motivated computer scientist, with big passion for artificial intelligence.
